pullRequest.title: Fluid Placeholder Block Placement
pullRequest.bodyText:
Follows up ldtteam/Structurize#234
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Allows builders to place Fluid Placeholder blocks as water or lava

would otherwise be placing a normal Fluid Placeholder block as is


Uses the simpler method for adding placement handlers without clearing the original registry

Review please

commit.message:
Merge branch 'version/1.16.3' of https://github.com/ldtteam/minecolonies into feature/fluidblock

 Conflicts:
	src/main/java/com/minecolonies/coremod/placementhandlers/PlacementHandlerInitializer.java

nodes.bodyText: Does this work nicely? The reason I had the complete override is to make sure the order stays like that.
